text: @MarshaBlackburn Political weaponization of America’s ongoing national health crisis by Pelosi & her fellow Democrats is about as low as it gets. All lies, all propaganda, all the time. Controlling the political narrative by hook or by crook is ALL they care about. #UnconscionableLiars #COVID19 https://t.co/ohpaUKaHLq
